I deprecated the Test Writer agent or Test Auditor agent and the frontend agent, backend agent, or devops agent. You need to spawn the test auditor to check over all the tests that QA wrote. And then if any changes need to be made, you need to spawn the test writer agent.

Yes, please have the DevOps agent run Claude CodeReview MCP on the entire project. If it would be better, you can spawn up to five of them and instruct them to work in parallel, auditing different parts of the codebase. Then, when they are all done, have them write a report and then hand all five reports to the research agent to create a summary report and validate findings.
